entry.title: Zunami Protocol Loses Over $2.1 Million in Price Manipulation Hack
entry.summary: The DeFi yield farming aggregator promised "the highest APY on the market."

entry.title: Donald Trump, Long Skeptical of Crypto, Holds Up to $500,000 In Ethereum
entry.summary: The former president and 2024 Republican frontrunner has been dismissive about the value of cryptocurrency in the past.

entry.title: ‘Sucks for Sam’ Says Martin Shkreli as Bankman-Fried Is Booked Into Brooklyn Prison
entry.summary: The Brooklyn jail previously held Ghislaine Maxwell and Martin Shkreli.

entry.title: Former SEC Attorney John Reed Stark Says SEC Will Not Approve a Bitcoin Spot ETF
entry.summary: The attorney says a Republican administration after 2024 would be friendlier to ETF applications and roll back enforcement actions.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: PayPal Announces Stablecoin While SEC Saves Face in Ripple Lawsuit
entry.summary: There were also strong indications of incoming Ethereum Futures ETFs this week.

entry.title: Law Professors Scrutinize SEC Notion of ‘Investment Contract’ in Coinbase Lawsuit
entry.summary: The amicus brief included subject expertise from legal scholars at some of the top U.S. law schools.

entry.title: How To Bring Wall Street Into Crypto? Build Better ‘Piping,’ Says Talos CEO
entry.summary: Anton Katz says Wall Street firms need tools that better connect them to trading opportunities similar to the ones they use on capital markets.

entry.title: Aragon Aims to Accelerate DAO Launches With Base
entry.summary: Aragon is launching its namesake app and OSx protocol on the new Coinbase blockchain, which can help DAOs get off the ground without developer expertise.

entry.title: Paris Hilton Won't Stop Trying to Make 'Sliving' Happen
entry.summary: The influencer has launched Slivingland, a Roblox game inspired by a word she's been trying to get off the ground for almost four years.

entry.title: Why the MET Is Expanding Into the Metaverse With Roblox
entry.summary: The Metropolitan Museum has launched a quest based app and installed a virtual doppelgänger on the Roblox gaming platform to meet young visitors where they are.

entry.title: Chatbot Makers Respond to Accusations That AI Promotes Eating Disorders
entry.summary: The Center for Countering Digital Hate tested the safety guardrails of popular chatbots and found them lacking.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Prices Inch Upwards After PayPal Pitches Stablecoin
entry.summary: The SEC this week did a lot of playing for time, but a new note on stablecoins by the Federal Reserve signaled a possible softening on crypto in Washington.

entry.title: A Loan Is Still a Loan Even in DeFi
entry.summary: What happens when you mix microfinancing, a motorbike company in Kenya, and decentralized lending? Lots of risk.

entry.title: 'Hope You Enjoy Prison': Crypto Twitter Reacts as Sam Bankman-Fried's Bail Is Revoked
entry.summary: Disgraced FTX founder and former CEO Sam Bankman-Fried was sent to jail for witness tampering—and crypto personalities didn't hold back.

entry.title: Degens Allegedly Launched Lil Tay Token Amid Teen Rapper's Death Hoax
entry.summary: The internet-famous rapper is apparently alive, but now there’s crypto confusion in the mix thanks to multiple Lil Tay-themed tokens.

entry.title: Custodia Bank Now Accepting US Dollar Deposits, Adding Bitcoin Custody
entry.summary: “The bar is very high for banks to launch, and we cleared it," Custodia Bank CEO Caitlin Long told Decrypt.

entry.title: SEC Seeks to 'Usurp Congress's Authority' in Coinbase Lawsuit: Blockchain Association
entry.summary: "The SEC is trying to short-circuit the legislative process" the consortium of crypto associations argued in its court brief.

entry.title: 'Scammy Dumpster Fire'—Overwatch 2 Steam Debut Review Bombed Into Oblivion
entry.summary: Over 47,000 negative player reviews have taken Blizzard to task for various complaints, from the free-to-play model to the missing PvE mode.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Is Going to Jail, Judge Revokes Bail Over Witness Tampering
entry.summary: Disgraced FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried's bail has been revoked. He will be detained in jail until the start of his criminal trial in October.

entry.title: This Grand Theft Auto 5 Mod Lets AI NPCs Insult You
entry.summary: Rockstar's open-world smash gains new life via AI—and the NPCs really have a mind of their own, with one ranting about a "divine AI god."

entry.title: Are You Not Entertained? Elon Musk Says Fight With Zuck Will Be Livestreamed via Twitter, Meta
entry.summary: Elon Musk suggests the clash of the tech titans will happen in "an epic location" in Italy—though he may need surgery first.

entry.title: There’s More Evidence ChatGPT Is a Good Doctor But a Bad Coder
entry.summary: Two research papers evaluating ChatGPT's accuracy conclude that the AI chatbot seems to be better at writing prescriptions than writing code.

entry.title: Ethereum DeFi Dashboard DeBank Launches Layer-2 on Optimism’s OP Stack
entry.summary: DeBank plans to launch a social media platform, DeBank Stream, by leveraging the 200,000-plus users on its chat app DeBank Hi.

entry.title: 'Parallel' Puts an Epic Sci-Fi Spin on Complex NFT Card Battles
entry.summary: PREVIEW: Parallel is a competitive trading card game with NFTs—for fans of the genre and space operas alike. We go hands-on with the beta.

entry.title: Musician Nick Cave Rails Against AI: ChatGPT Is the 'Commodification of the Human Spirit'
entry.summary: Cave asserts AI overlooks the struggles in creativity and mechanizes the artistic process.

entry.title: SEC Pumps Brakes on ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF
entry.summary: With more attention than ever on Bitcoin ETFs, the SEC has again delayed its decision on the ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF application.

entry.title: Parallel TCG: Inside the Sci-Fi Card Game’s Closed Beta
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes hands-on with Parallel’s closed beta on Windows PC to find out what sets it apart from other crypto card-battlers.

entry.title: Visa Trials Ethereum Gas Fee Payments Using Cards
entry.summary: Global payment technology giant Visa has successfully completed a test that enables users to pay Ethereum gas fees using credit or debit cards.

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Could Help Decarbonize Energy Grids, Researchers Say
entry.summary: Bitcoin mining can indeed help achieve decarbonization, but faces some stiff practical challenges along the way, researchers find.

entry.title: Fool Me Once: Ethereum Traders Make More Money After Being Scammed
entry.summary: One of the researchers said "burning your fingers is good for you," to an extent, because traders diversify and de-risk.

entry.title: Generative AI a Top Emerging Risk for Organizations: Gartner Survey
entry.summary: Intellectual property, data privacy and cybersecurity are three areas that need to be addressed quickly, according to Gartner.

entry.title: $170M Bridged to Coinbase Layer-2 Base as Daily Active Users Hit 136,000
entry.summary: The new chain has entered the top five layer-2 networks by total amount bridged, while daily active users hit 136,000.

entry.title: These Are the High-Profile Ethereum Futures ETF Applications Currently in Play
entry.summary: The first Ethereum futures ETF could be launched as soon as October 2023—that is, if the SEC approves it.

entry.title: Binance Labs Invests $10M to Accelerate Helio Protocol's Liquid Staking Pivot
entry.summary: LSDfi is a fast growing space within DeFi. Now Binance is throwing capital into it.

entry.title: Post Malone Disses CBDCs on Joe Rogan Podcast—And Bitcoiners Love It
entry.summary: Bitcoin supporters back the celebs’ take on CBDCs as the “digital dollar” discussion reaches mainstream audiences.

entry.title: As Coach Swallows Versace, A Crypto Divide Grows in Luxury Fashion
entry.summary: An $8.5 billion merger between luxury giants could have major implications for the future of blockchain in fashion.

entry.title: Crypto Gaming Investments Surged in July as Metaverse NFTs Fizzled Out
entry.summary: Investors pumped $297 million into the fledging crypto video game industry in July, but metaverse NFT sales have slowed significantly.

entry.title: The Godfather of Generative Art Goes Global
entry.summary: Pioneering generative artist Casey Reas will release "923 Empty Rooms" with Bright Moments and Art Blocks at live events spanning six cities.

entry.title: Alameda Hits a Snag in Lawsuit Over $9 Billion Locked in Grayscale Bitcoin Trust
entry.summary: The FTX affiliate first sued Grayscale in March. Now it says it needs more time to find a co-plaintiff.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Bittrex Agrees to Pay $24 Million to Settle SEC Lawsuit
entry.summary: Four months after the SEC sued, bankrupt exchange Bittrex has agreed to a settlement without admitting to or denying the allegations.

entry.title: AI Is Literally Trying to Kill You With This Grocery Store App
entry.summary: Trying to use up leftovers? An AI-powered app produced ghastly results when users input things like "turpentine" and "ant-poison."

entry.title: Web3 Games Need to Compete with All Games, Says Solana Foundation GM
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's General Manager of Games Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Solana's PlayGG conference and shares his take on crypto gaming and the "play-to-earn" concept.

entry.title: Many Early Blockchain Games Were 'Cash Grabs,' Says Twitch Streamer Alliestrasza
entry.summary: "I wrote them off," Twitch streamer Alliestrasza said of her initial thoughts on many early blockchain games. She tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how her perspective on Web3 games has evolved over time and now sees blockchain games getting significantly better.

entry.title: 'MetalCore' Game Preview: Hands-on With the 'Titanfall' Meets 'Destiny' NFT Mashup
entry.summary: MetalCore is an upcoming mech shooter developed by Studio 369, and it's being developed on Ethereum scaling network Immutable zkEVM. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin played through the prologue and tested out the recent Alpha 3 online experience to get a sense of the NFT-infused mashup of Titanfall and Destiny.

entry.title: 'Give Projects a Chance,' Says Aurory's Michael Natoli on NFT Game Challenges
entry.summary: Aurory is an NFT-driven game franchise that started life on Solana and is expanding to other chains. Decrypt's Jason Nelson spoke with Aurory Head of Marketing Michael Natoli at Solana's PlayGG event, where Natoli shared his thoughts on the challenges that blockchain games face in reaching players.

entry.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee
entry.summary: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.

entry.title: Com2uS Is Going "Full Speed" on Crypto Gaming: Kyu Lee
entry.summary: Kyu Lee is the President of game studio Com2uS USA. In an interview, he shares the studio's approach to Web3 and crypto gaming with Decrypt GG's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.

entry.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO
entry.summary: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor
entry.summary: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.

entry.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect
entry.summary: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.

entry.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies
entry.summary: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.

entry.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead
entry.summary: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.

entry.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder
entry.summary: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.

entry.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta
entry.summary: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.
